text: k̄heā kl̀āw ẁā “k̄ĥā tæ̀ phracêā k̄hxng k̄ĥā phraxngkh̒ k̄hx phraxngkh̒ thrng xp̣hạy h̄ı̂ kæ̀ k̄ĥā phraxngkh̒ d̂wy k̄hx phraxngkh̒ thrng prathān xảnāc xạn kŵāngk̄hwāng kæ̀ k̄ĥā phraxngkh̒ sụ̀ng mị̀ khū̀khwr kæ̀ p̄hū̂ dı nxkcāk k̄ĥā phraxngkh̒ thæ̂cring phraxngkh̒ thèānận pĕn p̄hū̂thrng prathān h̄ı̂ xỳāng mākmāy
